com.qtplaf.library.util.math

Class Incubator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.util.math.Incubator

  • public class Incubator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic static calculator methods currently not in use.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • normalizeSign

        public static double normalizeSign(double value,
                                   double maximum,
                                   double minimum)
        Normalizes the value in a range of maximum/minimum values with a sign. If both the maximum and the minimum are positive, normalizes to the range [1.0, 0.0]. If both are negative, normalizes in the range [0.0, -1.0]. If the maximum is positive and the minimum is negative, normalizes in the range [1.0, -1.0].
        Parameters:
        value - The value to normalize.
        maximum - The maximum.
        minimum - The minimum.
        Returns:
        The normalized value.

      • meanSquaredMinimum

        public static double[] meanSquaredMinimum(double[] output,
                                          double[] input,
                                          double learningFactor,
                                          double maximumError,
                                          int maximumIterations)
        Returns the output vector translated to minimize the mean squared error.
        Parameters:
        output - Initial output vector.
        input - Input vector, or reference.
        learningFactor - Learnin factor.
        maximumError - The minimum error to break the loop.
        maximumIterations - The maximum number of iterations.
        Returns:
        The output vector translated to minimize the mean squared error.
